> I decided to go with the third prompt and try out NIGHTFALL for this entry. I'm happy to get back into art! I hope this is adequately scary enough for Halloweencon.
> 
> //(Note: Sorry for the blemishes and whatnot, this is art that I made physically and then took a picture of so I could post it here.)//
